actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to authenticate and perform tests to certify that livestock and poultry semen for export satisfies the requirements of the foreign country to which such semen is to be exported.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to authenticate and perform certification tests of export livestock and poultry semen.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to authenticate and perform tests to certify that livestock and poultry semen for export satisfies the requirements of the foreign country to which such semen is to be exported.
